item.description: Neural networks coming soon â€¦ NN for linear regression NN for image classification - binary - categorical NN for image segmentation (stretch) plot(cars) Add a new chunk by clicking the Insert Chunk button on the toolbar or by pressing Cmd+Option+I. When you save the notebook, an HTML file containing the code and output will be saved alongside it (click the Preview button or press Cmd+Shift+K to preview the HTML file).
